section.title: Processor (CPU)
section.para: You may want to install the 64-bit version of Pardus &PRODVER; if your system is equipped with one of the processors listed in the sections below.

section.title: System memory (RAM)
section.para: System memory (RAM) requirements of Pardus &PRODVER; depends heavily on your daily workflow so it is very hard to define upper and lower bounds, but we recommend at least &MINMEM; of memory for a smooth desktop experience.

section.title: Minimum requirements
section.para: Pardus &PRODVER; requires at least &MINREQSPACE; of free hard disk space for a successful installation. As we don't offer custom package selection during the installation, this minimum size constraint applies to all installations.

section.title: Recommended requirements
section.para: In order to effectively use Pardus &PRODVER; on your system without running low on disk space during your daily workflow, we recommend at least &RECOMMSPACE; of free hard disk space.

section.title: Note on Swap space
section.para: Swap space is used whenever your operating system runs out of physical memory. If you think that your physical memory is big enough for your daily usage, you may skip creating a swap space during installation.
Note that a disk partition reserved for swap space is required if you want to hibernate (Suspend to disk) Pardus. Otherwise the functionality will be disabled.
